Class ImageBuilder

java.lang.Object
ch.supsi.business.image.ImageBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
ImageBuilderInterface
public class ImageBuilder extends Object implements ImageBuilderInterface
Builder class for creating and configuring instances of images. Implements ImageBuilderInterface to provide methods for setting image attributes, performing validation, and supporting optional pixel conversion via an adapter.

    • build

      public ImageBuilder build()
      Builds the image after validating the provided attributes. If an adapter is provided, it converts the raw pixel data to ARGB format.
      Returns:
      the ImageBuilder instance
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if required attributes (filePath or magicNumber) are missing
